attributes.name: [Azure AI Foundry] Model Availability above threshold

esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for model availability is < 99%, and the alerting rule is grouped by Model Name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the model_availability in the WHERE clause, which is specified in percent. 
 FROM metrics-azure.ai_foundry-default
| STATS model_availability = MAX(azure.ai_foundry.model_availability_rate.avg) * 100
 by azure.dimensions.model_deployment_name
| WHERE model_availability < 99
